sentences.en: But we've seen little discussion on the relation between verb tenses and succinctness.
sentences.cn: 但有关动词时态与简练的关系的论述不多见.

sentences.en: Terseness or succinctness of style or expression.
sentences.cn: 简洁是他的文体的特色。

sentences.en: The consituentfactors of the scientific theoretic beauty areharmoniousness, unity, succinctness, tight logic and symmetry etc.
sentences.cn: 科学理性美的构成要素包括和谐 、 统一 、 简洁 、 逻辑严密和对称等.

sentences.en: The design is characterized by logicality, flexibility, systematization and succinctness by case analysis.
sentences.cn: 并通过实例证明设计上具有逻辑性、灵活性、系统性和简洁性等特点。
